text:
In a test with a ramp-up period, if you start and shortly after try to stop the
test, you'll need to wait until the end of the ramp-up period -- which can be a
pain if you have a 5-minute ramp-up and you notice you've made a mistake just
after starting the test.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
